description.narrative: The project development objective is to increase utilization and quality of maternal and child health services in targeted areas.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :External Auditor. | Description :To facilitate the carrying out of independent audits under Part B.3 of SectionII to the Financing Agreement, the Recipient shall, not later than three (3) months after the Effective Date, appoint an externalauditor, in accordance with the provisions of Section III.C of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement. | Due Date :30-April-2015.[External auditor has been recruited and finished the field work. A final report is expected end June 2016]

Finance Agreement :Financial and Accounting Software should be acquired and installed. | Description :The Recipient shall, notlater than three (3) months after the Effective Date: (i) acquire in accordance with the provisions of Section III of Schedule 2 tothe Financing Agreement, and thereafter install, appropriate financial management/accounting software to facilitate the propermaintenance of its financial management system referred to in Part B.1 of Section II to the Financing Agreement; | Due Date:30-April-2015

Finance Agreement :Mid-Term Review | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than thirty (30) months after the Effective Date,undertake, in conjunction with all agencies involved in the Project, a comprehensive mid-term review of the Project (Refer toSection II A of FA) | Due Date :17-Oct-2016

Finance Agreement :Procurement Audit | Description :Without limitation upon the provisions of Part B.3 of this Section III, theRecipient shall, in each Fiscal Year (“FY”) beginning FY2016, carry out under terms of reference satisfactory to the Association,an audit of contracts procured in the preceding FY and furnish said audit to the Association not later than six months after theend of the FY to which said audit relates. | Due Date :30-Dec-2015

Finance Agreement :Training of Procurement Staff. | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than twelve (12) months after theEffective Date, provide training for the Project’s procurement staff, under terms of reference acceptable to the Association. | DueDate :30-Dec-2015

Finance Agreement :Update of procurement filing and record keeping system | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than six(6) months after the Effective Date, update, for purposes of the Project, its procurement filing and record keeping system, in formand substance acceptable to the Association. | Due Date :17-April-2015

title.narrative: Number of deliveries attended by skilled health personnel
People who have received essential health, nutrition, and population (HNP) services
Number of women and children who have received basic nutrition services
Percentage of children aged between 6 and 59 months receiving nutritional services
Percentage of pregnant women who received two doses of IPT
New Curative Consultation per Capital per year
Percentage of women counseled and tested for HIV
Number of new and existing acceptors of modern contraceptive use
Percentage of pregnant women having at least 3 antenatal care visits before delivery
Number of poor people benefiting from fee exemption mechanisms
Average Score of the quality checklist
